name: tm55
effect: Teaches Brine to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Scald to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV: Brine)

flavor_text.black_white: The user shoots boiling hot water at its target. It may also leave the target with a burn.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: The user shoots boiling hot water at its target. It may also leave the target with a burn.
